Are the values of these features constan.yes: You may pass features to bTrack. Both motion and feature information will be combined to perform tracking.
Are the values of these features constan.no: Abrupt transitions in the features may perturb bTrack's performance and truncate trajectories prematurely. Avoid passing features.

Are morphological, tonal or textural fea.no: No need to pass features. The tracking will rely exclusively on the cell positions. Skip this step.
